Mountain_View.Silicon Valley: Silicon Valley is a nickname for the southern portion of the San Francisco Bay Area in the northern part of the U.S. state of California. The "valley" in its name refers to the Santa Clara Valley in Santa Clara County, which includes the city of San Jose and surrounding cities and towns, where the region has been traditionally centered. The region has expanded to include the southern end of Santa Clara County down to Gilroy and southern portions of the East Bay in Alameda County.
